snippet: Tens of thousands of people holding colored boards gathered in Nepal's capital on Saturday in an attempt to break the record for the largest human national flag....

headline.print_headline: Thousands Gather in Nepal for Human Flag Record
headline.main: Thousands Gather in Nepal for Human Flag Record

lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of people holding colored boards gathered in Nepal's capital on Saturday in an attempt to break the record for the largest human national flag.
